summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Taya Beauty Buriti Nut Intensive Repair Shampoo & Conditioner Duo – Organic Hydrating Shampoo and Conditioner for Dry Damaged Hair - Restorative Hair Care – Travel Size 2 fl oz
Review Date: 2020/09/28
Store: TAYA I AM.
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'TAYA I AM.', 'Hair Type': 'All, Dull, Color Treated, Dry, Chemically Treated, Damaged', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '5.25 x 3.5 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '858308002635'}
Review Text: For the price of shampoo and conditioner, I buy all natural and still get bottles easily 10-20x the size of these, this would be a good travel kit, but it's not worth the money... The scent isn't bad, and it's overall decent, but it's far too expensive for the size.
Review Title: Tiny bottles, good product...
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: X5 Superlite Advanced Ionic Cushion Hairbrush - Frizz-free Styler & Detangler for Wet or Dry Hair - Silver Black
Review Date: 2020/11/05
Store: X5 Superlite
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'X5 Superlite', 'Color': 'Black,Silver', 'Shape': 'Oval', 'Special Feature': 'Vented, Ionic, Non Slip', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 1 x 10 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '705320126538'}
Review Text: So I'm used to hairbrushes being heavy and making brushing my long hair even more of a chore than it already is to get all the tangles out, but this brush is extremely light and it doesn't compromise on quality to get that light... I'm thoroughly impressed at how well this brush performs with my mess of hair. ^.^
Review Title: Well that's a light hairbrush!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 24 Inches Synthetic Long Curly Blonde Wig Natural Wavy Hair NONE Lace Heat Resistant Wigs for Women Cosplay Costume
Review Date: 2020/12/01
Store: AILIWEI
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.69 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'AILIWEI', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.69 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '710731915817'}
Review Text: So for me this wig looks different than the photos but it's okay enough for me. I'm not picky but it's not a 5 star item because of the differences between the photos and the item. though for the price it does look great and realistic.
Review Title: Hmmm....
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Makeup Headband 4 Pack Bow Hair Band Women Cat Ears Facial Spa Headband Soft Carol Fleece Hair Stuff Hairlace Party Favors Skincare Headbands for Girls Washing Face Shower Mask (Blue,Purple,Pink,Gray)
Review Date: 2020/12/11
Store: YanJie
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Color': 'Blue,Gray,Pink,Purple', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Party', 'Material': 'Microfiber', 'Fabric Type': 'Microfiber,Fleece', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 7.8 x 2.68 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '751300682587'}
Review Text: I specifically use these to keep hair off my face when washing, and it works very well for that... makes it much easier to wash up! quality seems to be good too, I have no complaints.
Review Title: So...
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: TCM Mancode 101 Men's Hair Conditioner 16oz
Review Date: 2021/01/02
Store: TCM
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'TCM', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'UPC': '851058008421'}
Review Text: I am unimpressed. It doesn't do the job for my long hair, I assume it's better catered to the man with short hair... which I am not. but through my testing it doesn't work well... which warrants a lower score >.> Overall I like the scent and the pump bottle, but it doesn't seem up to the task of the long hair... which is upsetting.
Review Title: As a man with long hair...
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YinMer Lavish Lash – Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum with Biotin & Natural Growth Peptides for Long, Thick Lashes and Eyebrows
Review Date: 2021/02/04
Store: OUZIFISH
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 2.8 x 1.26 inches; 3.53 Ounces'}
Review Text: I don't know if this made a difference or not... I really don't think it did. It comes packaged pretty and promises good results, but I didn't seem to notice any in the time I've been using it. Your mileage may vary though, I assume it works different depending on how your eyelashes already are...
Review Title: Here's the thing... does it actually work?
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 5PCS Spiral Hair Ties, Hair Coils, Power Coil Hair Ties, No Crease Hair Ties, Phone Cord Hair Ties, Extra Strong Elastic Grip Elastic Coil Hair Ties for Women Girls
Review Date: 2021/02/25
Store: UDIKEFO
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic, Thermoplastic Polyurethane', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'UDIKEFO', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.57 x 1.18 x 1.18 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.18 x 1.18 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '783710515780'}
Review Text: I'm a woodworker with long hair, so I have to tie my hair back in the wood shop, and these are perfect for it, they don't slip around, they're plastic so if they get dirty I can rinse them off, and overall I'm really happy with them.
Review Title: I like them
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history reveals a preference for hair care products, particularly those that emphasize natural ingredients and functionality. The individual demonstrates a keen sensitivity to price, often commenting on the value relative to product size and quality, indicating a preference for large, affordable options over premium-priced smaller items. 

Consistency in ratings suggests a mixed sentiment; while they appreciate lightweight and effective tools like hairbrushes, they express dissatisfaction with performance and price-value ratios, especially in hair products. Themes of practicality emerge, as seen in their choice of convenient items for hair management and self-care. The individual displays a desire for cosmetic products that deliver visible results, but they are critical when expectations aren’t met, as illustrated by lower ratings for items lacking efficacy. 

Quality is a central preference, with positive sentiments linked to products that balance function with ease of use. The presence of various accessory styles shows some interest in aesthetic appeal while practicality remains paramount. This person's core preferences center around value, effectiveness, and quality, underscored by a thoughtful approach to purchases that prioritize functionality and reasonable pricing.

target_interaction.title: I use this when I'm lazy....
target_interaction.text: I used this when I'm too lazy to spend a long time in the shower washing my hair and conditioning it, and my hair always comes out amazing when using it... though it's very painful if you're rinsing it out and get some in your eye... so don't do that and you'll be fine. Good shampoo though, love it!
target_interaction.title_meta: think nature Himalaya Pink Salt Shampoo Cherry Blossom, No Sulfate Paraben, All Hair Types, 9.52 Fl oz
